imdb.plot outline: The cornerstone of the shows is the live performances from three or four bands each month. In an era where most music TV shows featured non-stop miming. The Independent Session supported the old boys of rock as well as the Independent music scenes, touching on many innovative new styles emerging from The Uk. The Independent Session was set up to have a complete refreshing lack of musical snobbery, and proudly developed close relationships with Steve Diggle amongst others.
imdb.title: The Independent Session
plot: The cornerstone of the shows is the live performances from three or four bands each month. In an era where most music TV shows featured non-stop miming. _The Independent Session_ (qv) supported the old boys of rock as well as the Independent music scenes, touching on many innovative new styles emerging from The Uk. _The Independent Session_ (qv) was set up to have a complete refreshing lack of musical snobbery, and proudly developed close relationships with Steve Diggle amongst others.::Anonymous
